Points.Name: DeadlyEvil_Erik_Escort_with_waypoints
Points.Objects2: SET,0x4004C11B/DoReset/True:MX=1:SB=1:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1:SP=1:PR=-1:OBJ=SETONCARRIED,Dispell The Evil/Completed3/True/AddJournalEntry/Wickedness you will find:Erik gave an excerpt from the Deadwood Journals - the fabled guide that would lead to the necronomicon. Before leaving he mentioned that this is most likely where Ash is too. It reads as the following: nd East from a bridge of stone. Before into the starry void ye fall, traverse the cliffs who contours ye must follow. The Necronomicon lies........the excerpt ends.:MX=1:SB=1:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1:SP=1:PR=-1:OBJ=SETONTRIGMOB/MSG/Quickly - unlock the door before the Deadlights return!:MX=1:SB=1:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1:SP=1:PR=-1:OBJ=SET,0x400CD354/DoRespawn/True:MX=1:SB=1:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0:RK=0:CA=1:DN=-1:DX=-1:SP=1:PR=-1:OBJ=SETONNEARBY,1,*,PlayerMobile/SENDMSG/ObjectiveCompleted.
